caption.p:
Comparison between the single-crystal XRD obtained hk0 reciprocal lattice layer of 4-days annealed sample with the 25 MC swap evolved one: The diffuse scattering streaks emerging asymmetrically from the Bragg reflection spots are shown with little arrows. The experimental left side portion of the reciprocal lattice layer is adapted from ref.
19 with permission from Elsevier.
